com.skye.lover.view.photoview

类 PhotoViewAttacher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skye.lover.view.photoview.PhotoViewAttacher
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.view.View.OnTouchListener, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener, OnGestureListener, IPhotoView

    public class PhotoViewAttacher
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPhotoView, android.view.View.OnTouchListener, OnGestureListener, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  PhotoViewAttacher.OnMatrixChangedListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the internal Matrix has changed for this View.
      static interface  PhotoViewAttacher.OnPhotoTapListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the Photo is tapped with a single tap.
      static interface  PhotoViewAttacher.OnScaleChangeListener
      Interface definition for callback to be invoked when attached ImageView scale changes
      static interface  PhotoViewAttacher.OnViewTapListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the ImageView is tapped with a single tap.

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 com.skye.lover.view.photoview.IPhotoView

        DEFAULT_MAX_SCALE, DEFAULT_MID_SCALE, DEFAULT_MIN_SCALE, DEFAULT_ZOOM_DURATION

    • 方法详细资料

      • setOnDoubleTapListener

        public void setOnDoubleTapListener(android.view.GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener newOnDoubleTapListener)
        从接口复制的说明: IPhotoView
        Sets custom double tap listener, to intercept default given functions. To reset behavior to default, you can just pass in "null" or public field of PhotoViewAttacher.defaultOnDoubleTapListener
        指定者:
        setOnDoubleTapListener 在接口中 IPhotoView
        参数:
        newOnDoubleTapListener - custom OnDoubleTapListener to be set on ImageView

      • setOnScaleChangeListener

        public void setOnScaleChangeListener(PhotoViewAttacher.OnScaleChangeListener onScaleChangeListener)
        从接口复制的说明: IPhotoView
        Will report back about scale changes
        指定者:
        setOnScaleChangeListener 在接口中 IPhotoView
        参数:
        onScaleChangeListener - OnScaleChangeListener instance

      • canZoom

        public boolean canZoom()
        从接口复制的说明: IPhotoView
        Returns true if the PhotoView is set to allow zooming of Photos.
        指定者:
        canZoom 在接口中 IPhotoView
        返回:
        true if the PhotoView allows zooming.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Clean-up the resources attached to this object. This needs to be called when the ImageView is no longer used. A good example is from View.onDetachedFromWindow() or from Activity.onDestroy(). This is automatically called if you are using.

      • getDisplayRect

        public android.graphics.RectF getDisplayRect()
        从接口复制的说明: IPhotoView
        Gets the Display Rectangle of the currently displayed Drawable. The Rectangle is relative to this View and includes all scaling and translations.
        指定者:
        getDisplayRect 在接口中 IPhotoView
        返回:
        - RectF of Displayed Drawable

      • setDisplayMatrix

        public boolean setDisplayMatrix(android.graphics.Matrix finalMatrix)
        从接口复制的说明: IPhotoView
        Sets the Display Matrix of the currently displayed Drawable. The Rectangle is considered relative to this View and includes all scaling and translations.
        指定者:
        setDisplayMatrix 在接口中 IPhotoView
        参数:
        finalMatrix - target matrix to set PhotoView to
        返回:
        - true if rectangle was applied successfully

      • setPhotoViewRotation

        public void setPhotoViewRotation(float degrees)
        已过时。 use setRotationTo(float)
        从接口复制的说明: IPhotoView
        Enables rotation via PhotoView internal functions. Name is chosen so it won't collide with View.setRotation(float) in API since 11
        指定者:
        setPhotoViewRotation 在接口中 IPhotoView
        参数:
        degrees - - Degree to rotate PhotoView to, should be in range 0 to 360

      • setRotationTo

        public void setRotationTo(float degrees)
        从接口复制的说明: IPhotoView
        Enables rotation via PhotoView internal functions.
        指定者:
        setRotationTo 在接口中 IPhotoView
        参数:
        degrees - - Degree to rotate PhotoView to, should be in range 0 to 360

        指定者:

      • setScaleType

        public void setScaleType(android.widget.ImageView.ScaleType scaleType)
        从接口复制的说明: IPhotoView
        Controls how the image should be resized or moved to match the size of the ImageView. Any scaling or panning will happen within the confines of this ImageView.ScaleType.
        指定者:
        setScaleType 在接口中 IPhotoView
        参数:
        scaleType - - The desired scaling mode.

      • setZoomable

        public void setZoomable(boolean zoomable)
        从接口复制的说明: IPhotoView
        Allows you to enable/disable the zoom functionality on the ImageView. When disable the ImageView reverts to using the FIT_CENTER matrix.
        指定者:
        setZoomable 在接口中 IPhotoView
        参数:
        zoomable - - Whether the zoom functionality is enabled.

        指定者:

      • setZoomTransitionDuration

        public void setZoomTransitionDuration(int milliseconds)
        从接口复制的说明: IPhotoView
        Allows to change zoom transition speed, default value is 200 (PhotoViewAttacher.DEFAULT_ZOOM_DURATION). Will default to 200 if provided negative value
        指定者:
        setZoomTransitionDuration 在接口中 IPhotoView
        参数:
        milliseconds - duration of zoom interpolation

      • getIPhotoViewImplementation

        public IPhotoView getIPhotoViewImplementation()
        从接口复制的说明: IPhotoView
        Will return instance of IPhotoView (eg. PhotoViewAttacher), can be used to provide better integration
        指定者:
        getIPhotoViewImplementation 在接口中 IPhotoView
        返回:
        IPhotoView implementation instance if available, null if not
